Tucson smiles back to everyone with a nod.  It was clear that he was very h=
appy to have a family of his own on the way.  His demeanor softens much mor=
e as the angry dragon gives way to a loving parent.  Yet a protective one a=
t that.

" don't worry she's in good hands.  When the time comes I will nee=
d your help, I want the offspring to arrive safely of course."

With that h=
e carries Talon to her chamber, holding her securely in his arms.

Nightshi=
ft chuckles.

" I can see it now... Anyone with a tail better be ready ta h=
ave the tip chewed on by a spunky little dragon or raptor.  And if it is a =
dragon, it'll have teeth, lots of Em.  "

Uproar chimes in.

" Who knows, m=
ight be a little lightning spitter like its dad..  Tucson can breathe light=
ning bolts.. Saw Em do it just a few moments ago.  Oh and watch out, they d=
o fly at an early age.   And if the offspring is draconic, there may be mor=
e than one.  Dragons and raptors are known ta have multiples ."



Local ar=
tist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital media. =
 

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  

Need =
a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this address =
and we will talk.  

On Jun 8, 2012, at 2:21 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclo=
nus@...> wrote:

> LEGACY watched as TUCSON and TALON embrace and con=
sider what will
> happen in the future. "Taking her to her chambers would, =
in all
> probability, be the best course of action."
> 
> BUMP nodded and s=
miled, "Yeah, it will be a while before she is going
> to need the medical =
bay."
> 
> There was an answering smile from SANTON, "You take care of her
=
> Tucson." He said. "I am going to help Leo." He also turned to leave
> the=
 room.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
>

There was an answering smile from SANTON, "You take care o=
